Reviews.Title: “Nasty, Dirty, Disgusting and rude people”
Reviews.Author: Lanham25
Reviews.Content: To start off it took them an hour to check us in as the lady at the desk kept printing off the wrong receipt and I had to sign it three different times. Next the beds were beyond nasty with cigarette burns in them and very dirty. The bath water was yellow and the bathroom was disgusting and the drain was clogged up. We complained about all of this and they said nothing could be done and refused to give us our money back. So not wanting to stay in that filthy room anymore we went out for the night and when we came back around 9:30 we realized had left both keys in the room. There was nobody working other than the cat in the front office so using a credit card I broke into the room. So really comforting to know how easy it was to get into the rooms. Also because the rooms were so bad we bought blow up floats to put on top of thr beds ti sleep on. For our troubles we were promised a bigger room over looking the beach the next morning and when I went to ask about it we were told no rooms were open and for me to go knock on the door and ask the people when they were leaving. After about an hour of waiting I continued to express how disappointed we were they finally gave me my money back and we packed up in like 5 minutes and left this horribke place!!!! I would rather sleep in a box than stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Dangerous and Nasty! No AC, no H2O for a day, Elevator electrocutes people. Owner does not care!!!”
Reviews.Author: TCrump81
Reviews.Content: Worse hotel stay EVER! Nasty rooms, the bed had trash under it and used cotton balls , I asked the maid to clean it and was told they only clean under the beds when they do a "deep clean." Our room had no AC or water on arrival. Water was turned on within 6 hours, but it took 48 hours for AC. Room smelled like mold and we bought our own cleaning products to clean the room. Day 3 we ordered pizza and the delivery guy got stuck in the elevator. He pressed the help button and yelled and scremed, I called the front desk and informed them. The delivery guy got out on another floor and brought the pizza, he was sweating and jerking all over poor guy. About 5 min later a lady from the front office came by and asked if I had called for help for the man and I said yes. She rudely informed me that I should have called her and let her know he had gotten out and to remember that for the NEXT TIME!! I said I'm sorry I thought you let the guy out on a different floor. So no elevator for 24 hours. Well that takes us to day 5. My 3 years old son decides to press the elevator button like all children do and was electrocuted! It was reported to the front desk to a lady named Jeanette [--] who says she is the owner. She goes to the elevator presses the button and says "it didn't shock me. There is nothing I can do about it." Why did we stay so long you ask? The policy you sign at checkin says absolutely no refunds! I didn't have extra money for another room :( I learned my lesson the hard way! Please don't have the same experience as we did go somewhere else! I don't know how they ever got a good review.

Reviews.Title: “greatt(:”
Reviews.Author: ashley w
Reviews.Content: well i went there had wonderful room service and a great view it was a once in a lifetime thing for me I am coming in June should be funn <3 Ash

Reviews.Title: “A great place to stay”
Reviews.Author: Mickeyst
Reviews.Content: I have stayed at the Cove Motel several times and feel each time like I am with family. The personnel are friendly, warm and helpful. The accommodations are clean and with the kitchen it makes a perfect place to stay and relax. Being on the oceanfront is spectacular and the pool and patio are sparkling clean. I have stayed many places but this is the one I continue to return to and plan to do even more in the future. Mickey

Reviews.Title: “We really loved it and Angelia was the best...”
Reviews.Author: grace122652
Reviews.Content: we stayed 4 nights and 5 days. Enjoyed every minute of our stay. We visited Flagler Beach and St.Augustine Lighthouse.

Reviews.Title: “We loved it !!”
Reviews.Author: roylaurie
Reviews.Content: February 2011 - Daytona 500 Race Week We were there from Thursday to the following Thursday. I loved the fact that we had a kitchenette that served our purposes perfectly. The view from our room was awesome and we were right on the beach. We looked forward to taking our morning coffee on the balcony overlooking the ocean. We're not very demanding people, so all was ok. We had problems with the shower-head and fifteen minutes after reporting the problem, a new one was installed. I recommend this place and would go back without hesitation. This might not be a five-star hotel, but this is just my kind of place.

Reviews.Title: “you get what you pay for!!!!”
Reviews.Author: mmgingras
Reviews.Content: very outdated, walls and plaster falling apart on inside and outside, comfortable beds, patio much too small, not enough room to put chair straight ahead, had to put sideways, price is reasonable, effeciency room with fridge and burner stove, but very old,grease coming ot from the side caked on, no fan in the washroom , very small and we had to open a window when we took a shower. nice pool, but they said it was heated, did not seem like it was, was pretty cold on most days. lights in the unit not properly positioned if someone wanted to watch t.v late while their partner was sleeping, again you get what you pay for, but i would not recommend, spend a bit more and the two hotels on either sideoffer the same thing and are much nicer. owner did not seem to be too friendly the week we went, also washer and dryer very old, needs a major update!!!!! last thing was told by the clerk at the front desk that fee for the entire stay had to be paid up front, did save some money coming here but I doubt very much that we will return, the maintenance man cleaning daily and very friendly. kitchener ontario May 2011.

Reviews.Title: “They made us feel like it truly was our "home away from home".”
Reviews.Author: sunsetman242
Reviews.Content: We found office,building and grounds staff friendly and helpful. the room was in good shape and on the beach. Parking was good. With all this motel had to offer it was a great deal. Extended our stay from three days to seven, that is how much we enjoyed our stay. We will return to The Cove Motel each time we are in the Daytona Beach area.

Reviews.Title: “Thanks for a great stay, hospitality beyond the nicest hotels around, and genuine family owned atmosphere.”
Reviews.Author: 7gremlins
Reviews.Content: Although it was not the typical time to be at the beach, my family made a last minute stop in Daytona. We were welcomed with good American spirit and hospitality. The rooms are well done, updated nicely with a small kitchen, and all was very clean. This hotel is old, but well kept. The owners and staff are so nice, it just makes us want to go back for a visit! Although it is not a fancy resort, this is perfectly fine for a great and comfortable beach trip.

Reviews.Title: “Over priced for what it is.”
Reviews.Author: Overheated_78
Reviews.Content: You don't have temperature control of your own room! It is controlled by the office. Which closes at 10 pm. So you are out of luck for anything after that until 8 am. This place is very outdated. Very Noisy. Could hear everything. The room had a musky smell to it. It flaired up our allergies. There was dirt and dust all over the air vent. They would not give us a refund! Nothing close by, Had to drive to get anything and get anywhrere.

Reviews.Title: “not fancy but good value for your dollar”
Reviews.Author: onehappyretiree
Reviews.Content: It's not fancy bay any means but it is good value. It is right on the beach, not a huge place. Every room has a view of the Atlantic and they all have a full kitchen: full size fridge, stove woth oven, microwave, 2 double beds or 1 queen. This is our 8th year here and we intend to come back again next year.

Reviews.Title: “One Week Stay At The Cove”
Reviews.Author: GorrilaFats
Reviews.Content: My wife and I stayed here for a week vacation. The Cove Motel is one of the old style motels in the Daytona Beach area. The ocean front efficiency we stayed in was a patched together type efficiency and not a true efficiency. The bathroom had about a 3 foot square piece of plywood on the ceiling and gave my wife an uneasy feeling. I checked it out and found this to be an access panel for the duct work but nothing to be concerned about. There was no ventilation fan in the bathroom being this is an older motel so you have to leave the small screened window above the tub open. This motel still uses a standard key for the door and not the updated security locks. The bed was very comfortable but was only full size and not queen size as expected. The Staff is friendly, the rooms are clean and the Ocean view was great. The free wireless internet had a 3 bar signal from our location and worked good. For the price that we paid I consider the Cove to be an average value. I consider the Cove to be one of the nicer kept old style motels. Although we enjoyed our stay we would look elsewhere next time around for a more up to date hotel / motel.

Reviews.Title: “Love This Motel!”
Reviews.Author: sdouglass1
Reviews.Content: This is the fourth year in a row that we have stayed at the Cove Motel.It's very clean.All the help is very nice.A great pool or you have the ocean a few steps away.I travel with my grandaughter and daughter so we like to stay where we feel really safe.Usually we go in June.But this year the way our vacations fell we had to go in July.It was a little to hot..I highly recommend this motel.We can't wait until next June. Sherry Douglass Illinois

Reviews.Title: “Cove motel a conseiller”
Reviews.Author: line1963
Reviews.Content: Nous sommes allés au cove motel mon mari et moi au mois de juin 2010 pour un séjour de 10 jours. Cela fais 5 années que nous y allons et nous sommes toujours bien recus. Le service est excellent, les chambres sont tres propres, le personnel est super gentil. Cet hotel est tout pret de toutes les commodités.

Reviews.Title: “couldn't ask for better!”
Reviews.Author: Mary6Illinois
Reviews.Content: My sister's & i have stayed here serveral times.We keep coming back, make our reservations in advance so we make sure we have a place to stay.The staff is friendly, helpful,cleaning crew is wonderful..spotless. The lady & Mike the night GUY are awsome!Couldn't ask for better...no need to look any further!!!Found my heaven! Mary :)

Reviews.Title: “Mesmerizing Ocean Front”
Reviews.Author: CalgaryBridget
Reviews.Content: The Cove is well located with ocean front rooms that are conducive to a restful stay. The staff were pleasant, helpful and able to recommend good nearby restaurants. Rooms were clean and included kitchen facilities. Very good value.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent choice with reasonably priced oceanfront rooms”
Reviews.Author: deadheadbill
Reviews.Content: We love The Cove, and have stayed there several times. The rooms are clean with great ocean views and reasonably priced. The staff is friendly and helpful.

Reviews.Title: “This Is A Decent Ocean Front Motel.”
Reviews.Author: Gibbiano
Reviews.Content: We stayed one nite at this motel and found it to be a decent place. If you are lookin for a 5 Star fancy motel then keep looking. This was the cheapest cleanest right on the beach motel/hotel we found while we were there. Again we was only in town for one nite and it worked for us. It is a little older but it was a decent room with a ocean front view/balcony. If you was going to stay for a extended time you might want to keep looking (but expect to pay more). It had a clean shower and decent beds so it worked for us for one night. The people that worked there were very nice and friendly.

Reviews.Title: “LOVED IT!.... and will be back again this year!”
Reviews.Author: lele520
Reviews.Content: My family and I went on a vacation last year and decided to wait until we arrived to get a motel. We chose The Cove Oceanside because we had stayed there once before, and enjoyed our stay. So, we decided to try it again. We loved it! The owners and staff were very friendly and helpful, the rates were low, and the rooms were comfortable. The pool was so nice and enjoyable, and we were able to save money on food by being able to cook our own meals in our room, or grilling out on the deck. We were able to meet several other guest who were staying there too while sitting out on the deck, and they had nothing but good things to say about their stay also...( for some this was their first time staying there).The beach was also very accessible, and while we were there they were in the process of making even more improvements on the property to make it an even more relaxing stay. I would recommend this motel to be a first on anyones list planning a stay at Daytona Beach. We will be returning there ourselves this year, and this is where we will stay.

Reviews.Title: “My little vacation away from home!”
Reviews.Author: kimmie1965
Reviews.Content: I was introduced to your hotel in 2006 by my friends, since the first time I went ,I go back every chance I can. I only live in Kissmmee, (about 1 1/2) hours away, but when I go for a weekend I feel like I am on vacation. From the great staff, to the wonderful view I would recommend for anyone from overseas, to just a few hours away. It is not a great big moderen or updated hotel by anymeans, but what they have they do right!

Reviews.Title: “cove motel the beach is at your feet.”
Reviews.Author: DRGX
Reviews.Content: this place is a very good place the staff are great and the owner very acessible and you have a very nice view of the sea. The room very clean, and you can cook your own food becaus there is little kitchen. very low price for my stay and remember at the cove motel the beach is at your feet.

Reviews.Title: “Helpful during Hurricanes”
Reviews.Author: patsfan16
Reviews.Content: I stayed at the Cove Motel during the scare with Hurricanes Fay and Hanna, The staff we're very helpful calming my fears and reassuring my wife. I have recently read several bad reviews and felt I had to write my own. I found the motel reasonably priced, very clean and the staff friendly and helpful. I'm wondering if the people that found the place so "nasty" complained to the owners or the staff about their rooms and if it was so bad, why stay 3 nights???

Reviews.Title: “"TERRRIBLE, NOT WHAT THEY ADVERTISE”
Reviews.Author: GalilahiNaplesFl
Reviews.Content: I thought I did my research, and I reviewed your website, read the great reviews, a few not so great and rolled the dice. I was very wrong, this place is terrible, it is nothing like the advertisment. The room I stayed in 106, was so nasty, the beds were old and stained, there were stains through out the room, and the smell is undescribable. I am just telling you, not ALL reviews are TRUTHFUL.. I am wondering if friends of the owner or the owners are posting these wonderful reviews.. because I did NOT see anything like the reviews or website. The Cove is NOT worth your hard earned money, please if you can go to wait until you get to Daytona and shop around with your eyes.. The Cove is NOT for you!! Unless you prefer Filth. This is an HONEST perception of what I saw and had to indure for 3 LONG nights!

Reviews.Title: “Great value, superb location”
Reviews.Author: Sepultra
Reviews.Content: We recently stayed at the Cove Motel and were extremely pleased with our choice in staying here. The motel is located just north of all the action, so you have the convienence of a central location, but a with a bit less of a crowd. The beachfront is beautiful, with soft sand, and perfect surf. The pool at the hotel is always just the right temperature. The hotel staff is personable, helpful and friendly, they made us feel like family, probably because it's a family-run business. The rooms are great, with kitchens, big cable TVs and daily maid service. This is really a great place to stay for the price, and we'll be bringing our friends back with us next year.....

Reviews.Title: “Tranquil”
Reviews.Author: Doug69
Reviews.Content: This was the Best Vacation I've been on in years.From the beautiful rooms great views of the ocean,with it just steps away from our room an the barbeque right on the deck @ our convenance made our trip affordable an peaceful Not having to go out for every meal.They Have A great staff on hand that coulden't do enough for us truely a Great place to stay Thanks Tim.

Reviews.Title: “Just can't wait to go back”
Reviews.Author: Aquasport
Reviews.Content: Me and a friend went down Daytona beach to pick up a boat, drove all the way down from Montreal Canada. Since we were tired from the 22 hour drive, we decided to pick up the first motel we would come across, the Cove Motel. Since it was dark when we arrived, it was hard to tell in what kind of shape this motel was in, I didn't care, it was cheap and I just wanted a place to crash, we got room 101. The next morning as I was waking up , the first thing I see from my bed is this beautiful sun rise with the beach WOW what a perfect way to start a day. We end up staying two nights there, would have stayed longer but all the rooms were booked. Of course, this is not a 4 star establishment, but for the price, you will not find a better place then this in Daytona, directly on the most beautiful beach in the world, the owner and staff are top notch. I told my wife once back home that the next time we go to Daytona we're are going to stay at this place You can't always judge a book by its cover Marc..

Reviews.Title: “Almost part of the beach”
Reviews.Author: buchos
Reviews.Content: We visit Daytona twice a year for two weeks each time and have stayed in several hotels in Daytona, but none more so than the Cove Motel in the past six years. As you can see by the photo you are literally on the beach and with no lobby to go through you can live between your room and the beach freely. The rooms are clean enough and roomy, though a little old, the balcony on all the rooms has a great view, its big enough for a couple of chairs. The only problem we have had on a couple of stays are the smells of smoking or cooking from adjacent rooms. This was so bad last year we bought duck tape to seal up the door and sadly this has meant we are trying somewhere else this year. Its an easy going place, you don't see much of the staff and its quiet and relaxed, this more than makes up for the decor and age of the bulding.

Reviews.Title: “a surfers paradise”
Reviews.Author: mpcmk
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Cove Motel in Daytona Beach, FL and had a fabulous time. My husband and two sons all surf and we found it to be the perfect surfers paradise. It was so nice to leave our very nice & comfy rooms...take just steps to the beach with boards in hand and hit the waves. Then we would return to the Cove...enjoy the outdoor shower to rinse from the saltwater and rinse the boards. Then a quick swim in the pool and back to our rooms. We enjoyed all the amenities and comfort of our room. We especially enjoyed having a kitchen in our room and the flexibility of cooking our own meals...which saved time and money on eating out. The kitchens are very clean and fully equipped with everything you may need to cook a good family meal. We found the staff to all be very friendly and helpful and always available. We even met the owners...a nice, young couple that take alot of pride in their place. We look forward to returning to the Cove for more surfing weekends in the future.

Reviews.Title: “Awesome little hotel”
Reviews.Author: RonKathy
Reviews.Content: The Cove Motel was one of the most relaxing stays I have ever had at any hotel anywhere. No, there is no fancy ammenities, no workout room, no disco bar, just the perfect setting for the next Corona commercial, miles away from the ordinary. The lady at the front desk called G.G. went WAY out of her way to make our stay feel like we were at home. The young guy that cleans up the pool was constantly making sure the property was spotless. The housekeepers were friendly and fast. We felt like we were in our own home on the beach. Ron & Kathy from the other coast of Florida.

Reviews.Title: “great stay.”
Reviews.Author: raman272
Reviews.Content: Great Stay, We Had One Of The Most Comfirtable Stay At This Motel.The Service Was Great And Friendly The Surroundings Beautifull.Amenities A+++++.Everything Was Just Right.We Would Highly Rcommend This Property To Others. Raman Mehra

Reviews.Title: “6 stars out of 5 for the Cove”
Reviews.Author: 81hoosier
Reviews.Content: The Cove offers all the comforts of home, only on the world's best beach and at a fraction of the cost of it's neighbors. The rooms are clean, every ocean view room has it's own private balcony/patio, the laundry rooms are clean and functional, the kitchenettes are fully equipped with pots, pans, silverware, etc. The help is friendly and available. Can't beat the location; a nice half-hour stroll up the beach takes you from the relative quiet and space of the beach a few steps from the Cove to the tacky/cool noise and action of the pier area. 10 year-old daughter loved it, middle-aged mom and dad loved it, senior neighbors seemed to love it. We'll be back.

Reviews.Title: “Great accomodations at cheap rates”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: I rented two oceanview rooms for my guest and I to stay for a week at this hotel. The cove is close to all attractions that Daytona has to offer as well as being directly on one of the greatest beaches in Florida. The staff was friendly and understanding to help out a few out of towners who wanted to have a good time. The rooms were clean and the maid service was excellent. I am visiting this hotel again this year and I cant wait to get down there. Thank you Cove

HotelInfo.Name: Cove Motel Oceanfront
HotelInfo.Address: 1306 North Atlantic Avenue, Daytona Beach, FL 32118
